entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQR.IFRS.0080.8615] ifrs-full:AmountRemovedFromReserveOfCashFlowHedgesAndIncludedInInitialCostOrOtherCarryingAmountOfNonfinancialAssetLiabilityOrFirmCommitmentForWhichFairValueHedgeAccountingIsApplied has a value of -81,000,000 which is less than zero. This element should not have a negative value.
The properties of this ifrs-full:AmountRemovedFromReserveOfCashFlowHedgesAndIncludedInInitialCostOrOtherCarryingAmountOfNonfinancialAssetLiabilityOrFirmCommitmentForWhichFairValueHedgeAccountingIsApplied fact are: Period :2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/549300V62YJ9HTLRI486/2020-12-31/ESEF/AT/0/omv-2020-12-31.zip/omv-2020-12-31/reports/omv-2020-12-31.xhtml 8519

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 01 - Konzern-Gewinn- und Verlustrechnung für das Geschäftsjahr 2020 but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. omv:ProfitLossAttributableToHybridCapitalOwners, ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9625] It is expected that ProfitLossAttributableToOwnersOfParent with a value of 1,258,000,000 reported in the network role http://www.omv.com/geschaeftsbericht-2020/roles/KonzernGewinnUndVerlustrechnungFuerDasGeschaeftsjahr2020 should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, ProfitLoss with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParentMember and a reported value of 1,341,000,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.omv.com/geschaeftsbericht-2020/roles/EntwicklungDesKonzernEigenkapitals2020. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToOwnersOfParent fact are:
Period : 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of ProfitLossAttributableToOwnersOfParent : -6 Decimals of ProfitLoss : -6 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/549300V62YJ9HTLRI486/2020-12-31/ESEF/AT/0/omv-2020-12-31.zip/omv-2020-12-31/reports/omv-2020-12-31.xhtml 8519

The properties of this ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent fact are:
Period : 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent : -6 Decimals of ComprehensiveIncome : -6 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/549300V62YJ9HTLRI486/2020-12-31/ESEF/AT/0/omv-2020-12-31.zip/omv-2020-12-31/reports/omv-2020-12-31.xhtml 8519
